name: Pediatrics
details: At Open Door Clinic, we partner with families to deliver expert, compassionate care to infants, children and teens.

name: Cardiology
details: Our comprehensive heart services include general and preventive cardiology, cardiac testing and imaging, specialized cardiology and cardiac surgery.

name: Neurosurgery
details: Our top-rated neurosurgeons use advanced imaging and surgical techniques to treat neurological conditions, such as brain tumors and traumatic brain injury.

name: Cancer Care
details: Open Door Clinic patients can expect comprehensive and individualized cancer care, delivered in convenient locations.

name: Pharmaceutical services
details: Medicine and medical equipment can be delivered at home. If the patient needs it, training can be provided on how to take medicines or use of the equipment, including intravenous therapy.

name: Laboratory and X-ray imaging
details: Certain laboratory tests, such as blood and urine tests, can be performed in the comfort of the patient's home. In addition, portable X-ray machines allow lab technicians to perform this service at home.
